subject: Indian History
topic: 19th aur 20th Century mein Samajik aur Dharmik Sudhar Andolan
question_en: Who was the leader of the Indian National Social Conference?
question_hi: भारतीय राष्ट्रीय सामाजिक संगीति के नेता कौन थे?
explanation_en: Madan Mohan Malaviya was a key leader of the Indian National Social Conference.
explanation_hi: मदन मोहन मालवीय भारतीय राष्ट्रीय सामाजिक संगीति के एक प्रमुख नेता थे।

subject: Indian History
topic: 19th aur 20th Century mein Samajik aur Dharmik Sudhar Andolan
question_en: Which of the following movements was led by Jyotirao Phule?
question_hi: ज्योतीराव फुले द्वारा किस आंदोलन का नेतृत्व किया गया था?
explanation_en: Satyashodhak Samaj was led by Jyotirao Phule.
explanation_hi: सत्यशोधक समाज ज्योतीराव फुले द्वारा नेतृत्व किया गया था।

subject: Indian History
topic: 19th aur 20th Century mein Samajik aur Dharmik Sudhar Andolan
question_en: Who was the founder of the Brahmo Samaj?
question_hi: ब्रह्म समाज के संस्थापक कौन थे?
explanation_en: Raja Ram Mohan Roy was the founder of the Brahmo Samaj.
explanation_hi: राजा राममोहन रॉय ब्रह्म समाज के संस्थापक थे।

subject: Indian History
topic: 19th aur 20th Century mein Samajik aur Dharmik Sudhar Andolan
question_en: What was the main objective of the Shuddhi movement?
question_hi: शुद्धि आंदोलन का मुख्य उद्देश्य क्या था?
A_hi: मुसलमानों को हिंदू धर्म में परिवर्तित करना
D_hi: एक नए धर्म की स्थापना करना
explanation_en: The main objective of the Shuddhi movement was to convert Muslims to Hinduism.
explanation_hi: शुद्धि आंदोलन का मुख्य उद्देश्य मुसलमानों को हिंदू धर्म में परिवर्तित करना था।

subject: Indian History
topic: 19th aur 20th Century mein Samajik aur Dharmik Sudhar Andolan
question_en: Who was the leader of the Arya Samaj?
question_hi: आर्य समाज के नेता कौन थे?
explanation_en: Swami Dayanand Saraswati was the leader of the Arya Samaj.
explanation_hi: स्वामी दयानन्द सरस्वती आर्य समाज के नेता थे।

subject: Indian History
topic: 19th aur 20th Century mein Samajik aur Dharmik Sudhar Andolan
question_en: Which of the following was a result of the social and religious reform movements of the 19th century?
question_hi: 19वीं सदी के सामाजिक और धार्मिक सुधार आंदोलनों का परिणाम क्या था?
A_en: The establishment of the British Raj
B_en: The rise of the Indian National Congress
C_en: The growth of education and literacy
D_en: The decline of traditional Indian culture
explanation_en: The growth of education and literacy was a result of the social and religious reform movements of the 19th century.
explanation_hi: 19वीं सदी के सामाजिक और धार्मिक सुधार आंदोलनों के परिणामस्वरूप शिक्षा और साक्षरता का विकास हुआ।

subject: Indian History
topic: 19th aur 20th Century mein Samajik aur Dharmik Sudhar Andolan
question_en: Who was the founder of the Satyashodhak Samaj?
question_hi: सत्यशोधक समाज के संस्थापक कौन थे?
explanation_en: Jyotirao Phule was the founder of the Satyashodhak Samaj.
explanation_hi: ज्योतीराव फुले सत्यशोधक समाज के संस्थापक थे।

subject: Indian History
topic: 19th aur 20th Century mein Samajik aur Dharmik Sudhar Andolan
question_en: What was the main objective of the Brahmo Samaj?
question_hi: ब्रह्म समाज का मुख्य उद्देश्य क्या था?
B_hi: एक नए धर्म की स्थापना करना
D_hi: मुसलमानों को हिंदू धर्म में परिवर्तित करना
explanation_en: The main objective of the Brahmo Samaj was to promote social reform.
explanation_hi: ब्रह्म समाज का मुख्य उद्देश्य सामाजिक सुधार को बढ़ावा देना था।

subject: Indian History
topic: 19th aur 20th Century mein Samajik aur Dharmik Sudhar Andolan
question_en: Which of the following was a result of the Arya Samaj's efforts?
question_hi: आर्य समाज की प्रयासों का परिणाम क्या था?
B_en: The rise of the Indian National Congress
C_en: The growth of education and literacy
D_en: The establishment of the British Raj
explanation_en: The growth of education and literacy was a result of the Arya Samaj's efforts.
explanation_hi: आर्य समाज की प्रयासों के परिणामस्वरूप शिक्षा और साक्षरता का विकास हुआ।

subject: Indian History
topic: 19th aur 20th Century mein Samajik aur Dharmik Sudhar Andolan
question_en: Who was the leader of the Indian Social Conference?
question_hi: भारतीय सामाजिक संगीति के नेता कौन थे?
explanation_en: Gopal Krishna Gokhale was the leader of the Indian Social Conference.
explanation_hi: गोपाल कृष्ण गोखले भारतीय सामाजिक संगीति के नेता थे।
